item.title: Why Windows Over Linux Desktop
item.description: Yes. This is yet another rant. Disclaimer: I’ve been a Linux user for almost 10 years, both for Desktop and Server. This blog post derives from my experience with my use case. If you don’t agree with me and want to share your opinion feel free to send me a DM or a tweet, but please, be polite. I’ll explain all the reasons that led me to stop using Linux on Desktop in favour of Windows 10, but first you need a bit of background to better understand what’s my use case.
